name: Lonely Paddle
description:
Lonely Paddle

Tennis for those lacking friends.

Smash the buddies, get the star, whack the balls, and compete with yourself for the high-score.

Features
  • Simple gameplay
  • Multi-ball!
  • Catchy music
Controls

Three inputs are supported:

  • Mouse: paddle follows the mouse + left click to confirm
  • Keyboard: arrow keys to move + Z to confirm
  • Gamepad: up/down to move + A  to confirm
Details

Art, music, and code by Brett Chalupa.

The game is built using HaxeFlixel and is open source. 

You can download the song in the game if you'd like to listen to it.

Let me know what you think in the comments! If you'd like a desktop release, let me know and I can build it for the main operating systems. Thanks for playing.

License

Lonely Paddle by Brett Chalupa is marked with CC0 1.0.
